title: Official SAV3 NFT medals for Kahoot game winners - Cost to produce $10-$15 per badge
body:
Kahoot.it games are being created for SAV3 and Rottenswap ecosystem
Let's incentivize DeFi education by creating more games and awarding badges to winners
Make custom ERC721 badges on Cargo with a custom SAV3 related ticker, and customize the metadata for game winners
People who perform well in the games will receive these badges
Cost per badge $10-$15 total, and run 3-4 contests a week
Estimated cost less than 1 ETH per month
This will also help new members learn about DeFi without scrolling in chat
author: 0xd342240C555a864CB4366031dDC6C285e3298443
